roleset.name: show again

example.name: redemonstrate-v: arg 0 as a pronoun
example.text: This redemonstrated the popliteal artery aneurysm

example.name: redeomonstrate-v
example.text: [Diffusely low-attenuation liver] is redemonstrated [*], consistent with fatty infiltration

example.name: redemonstration-n
example.text: Asymmetric pachymeningeal enhancement underlies the right craniotomy site , with redemonstration of right subdural fluid collection .

roleset.note: REDEMONSTRATE-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to demonstrate.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from redemonstrate.01-v)
